Package edu.depauw.csc232.solitaire.ui

Class Packet

java.lang.Object
edu.depauw.csc232.solitaire.ui.CardStack
edu.depauw.csc232.solitaire.ui.Packet
public class Packet
extends CardStack
A Packet is a CardStack that contains a collection of cards currently being dragged. The collection will not be empty.
Author:
bhoward

  • Constructor Details

    • Packet

      Packet​(Pile origin, int horizontal, int vertical)

  • Method Details

    • cancelDrag

      public void cancelDrag​(java.awt.event.MouseEvent event)
      Notify this packet that its current drag motion has been cancelled. The cards are returned to the origin pile.
      Parameters:
      event - the mouse event that cancelled the drag

    • endDrag

      public void endDrag​(Pile target, java.awt.event.MouseEvent event)
      Notify this packet that it has been dropped on the given pile. The cards are added to the target pile, and the origin is notified of the drag completion.
      Parameters:
      target - the target of the drop
      event - the mouseReleased event for the drop

    • getOrigin

      public Pile getOrigin()
      Returns:
      the pile from which this packet was dragged
